text:
[Verse]
Sunset falling down
On the golden ground
Colors spin around
In this sleepy town

[Verse 2]
Shadows growing long
Night will come along
Softly hum the song
As we move on

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams arise
In the fading skies
See the stars surprise
Right before our eyes

[Verse 3]
Walk down to the pier
Feel the night is near
Hold your whispers dear
No more need to fear

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams arise
In the fading skies
See the stars surprise
Right before our eyes

[Bridge]
Hearts begin to sway
In the twilight's play
Feel the end of day
Night has found its way
title: Sunset Dreams
